hex3.description: A 3-digit hexadecimal color code representing red, green, and blue components.

hex6.description: A 6-digit hexadecimal color code representing red, green, and blue components.

hex8.description: An 8-digit hexadecimal color code representing red, green, blue, and alpha (opacity) components.

rgb.description: An RGB color code representing red, green, and blue components.

hsl.description: An HSL color code representing hue, saturation, and lightness components.

cmyk.description: A CMYK color code representing cyan, magenta, yellow, and black components.
